tool_description: Powerful HTML to Image generation API. Generate PNG, JPEG or WebP images from HTML, CSS or URL. Most affordable prices.
name: HTML CSS to Image
title: HTML CSS to Image

api_list.name: Create an Image from HTML and CSS
api_list.description:
Send a HTML in the request with an optional CSS parameter and get back a URL in the response which renders it as an image in PNG, JPEG or WebP format.

You can choose to take a screenshot of a specific element inside the HTML using the `selector` parameter.

You can also specify the number of milliseconds you want our headless browser to wait before taking a screenshot.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://html-css-to-image4.p.rapidapi.com/image"

headers = {
            "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
            "X-RapidAPI-Host": "html-css-to-image4.p.rapidapi.com"
        }

response = requests.post(url, headers=headers)
print(response.json())

api_list.name: Create an Image from URL
api_list.description:
Send a website URL in the request get back a image URL in the in a format that you specify

You can specify a viewport height and width so that your screenshot looks the way it is supposed to look on your screen when you open this website.

You can also specify the number of milliseconds you want our headless browser to wait before taking a screenshot.
